events.message: I placed an order for a laptop two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived and the tracking status hasn't been updated for days.
The customer's issue has been classified under Delivery Delay due to complaint about late shipment and no tracking updates.
Support agent James has been assigned to handle the delivery delay issue reported by the customer.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. I'm sorry to hear your laptop hasn't arrived yet. Let me check the shipment status for you.
Could you please provide me with your order number or tracking ID so I can look up your delivery details?
Sure, my order number is 5587321, and the tracking ID given was TRK987654321.
Thank you for the information. I checked with the courier, and it seems the package is delayed due to unforeseen shipping issues. We expect delivery within the next 3 days.
I appreciate the update, but I wish the package was here sooner as I need it urgently for work.
I understand your urgency. As an apology for the delay, we can offer you expedited shipping on your next order or a small discount coupon.
Thanks for the offer, I would gladly accept the discount coupon for my next purchase.
Great! I've applied the discount coupon to your account and noted the delivery update. Please contact us if your package doesn't arrive within 3 days.
Just checking in to confirm that your laptop was delivered and everything is as expected now. Let us know if you need further assistance.
Yes, the laptop arrived yesterday in perfect condition. Thank you for your help and the discount coupon!
We are closing this case now as resolved. Feel free to reach out anytime if you need support in the future.
